SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into yc_activity (activity_name, activity_introduction, activity_group, activity_city, activity_status, activity_type, create_time, activity_leader, activity_image) values (#{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityGroup,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{activityCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activityLeader,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{activityImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update yc_activity set activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_introduction = #{activityIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_group = #{activityGroup,jdbcType=BIGINT}, activity_city = #{activityCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_status = #{activityStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_type = #{activityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activity_leader = #{activityLeader,jdbcType=BIGINT}, activity_image = #{activityImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select activity_id, activity_name, activity_introduction, activity_group, activity_city, activity_status, activity_type, create_time, activity_leader, activity_image from yc_activity where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select activity_id, activity_name, activity_introduction, activity_group, activity_city, activity_status, activity_type, create_time, activity_leader, activity_image from yc_activity
